confcost.controller.encryption

Class SymmetricEncryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.controller.encryption.Encryption
      • confcost.controller.encryption.SymmetricEncryption
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AESEncryption, RC2Encryption

    public abstract class SymmetricEncryption
extends Encryption
    Provides the interface for symmetric encryption methods.
    Author:
    Marc Eichler
